name: agent
title: Agent
description: An agent takes a role in an activity such that the agent can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place. An agent can be a person, a piece of software, an inanimate object, an organization, or other entities that may be ascribed responsibility.

fields.name: agentID
fields.description: A unique identifier for an Agent. Examples: `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097` (for a person); `https://ror.org/015hz7p22` (for an organization); `http://grscicoll.org/institution/museum-southwestern-biology` (for an organization); `https://www.gbif.org/grscicoll/collection/fbd3ed74-5a21-4e01-b86a-33d36f032d9c` (for a collection)

fields.name: agent_preferred_name
fields.description: The preferred form of the name when referring to the agent.  Examples: `person`, `organization`, `group`, `organism`, `software`
